The Professional Workspace provides a centralized environment for managing your work projects, documents, and professional resources. Select a persona to see role-specific content and tools tailored to your profession. The interactive mindmap visualizes your professional capabilities with expandable nodes for Documents, Tables, Forms, Reports, Templates, and Workflows. Use the calendar widget to track important events, chat with the AI assistant for guidance, and navigate between Home and Projects views to organize your professional work effectively.
